title: Dr. Lennart de Vries
text:
About
I am a Senior Specalist for Data & AI in the Public Sector at PD - Berater der öffentlichen Hand and an independent consultant and trainer for topics related to data science, machine learning and AI literacy. Before, I was a Research Data Scientist in Computational Cognitive Neuroscience (see lennartwittkuhn.com).

Photo: Henri Röttger (University of Hamburg)
